attributes.review: I saw this app on my daughter’s phone when I was looking through it. Needless to say this app is absolutely HORRENDOUS!!! It kept asking for my personal info such as phone numbers and emails (I only give that information to Facebook). I deleted this app right away for my daughter’s safety. This gets a big 👎🏻 from me. Please don’t download this unless you want your privacy invaded. Lol (lots of love) 😘🥰.
attributes.title: Just disgusting

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever come across. Not only does it represent a Cheeto, but it is beyond useless.
